name: Behold... The Inhumans Multiple Choice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the large dog with the ability to teleport?
questions.explanation:
Lockjaw.

	Lockjaw was a behemoth of a dog, weighing in at over 2,000lbs. The animal was made for the screen completely with CGI. While having the ability to teleport, the dog is also the companion of Crystal, one of the Inhuman royal family.  Crystal was played by Isabelle Cornish.

questions.text: Who was the first person shown to use their powers in the series?
questions.explanation:
Triton.

	Triton, played by Mike Moh, was a green-skinned Inhuman. He is the brother to Karnak (Ken Leung), and cousin to Gorgon (Eme Ikwuakor), Black Bolt (Anson Mount), Maximus (Iwan Rheon), Medusa (Serinda Swan), and Crystal (Isabelle Cornish). He is the son of Mander and Azur, but neither character appeared in the pilot of the series.

questions.text: What is the name of the city the Inhumans call home?
questions.explanation:
Attilan.

	Madripor was mentioned in the Marvel movies as a city that Agent Hill had been stationed in while serving overseas. Zioda was featured in an episode of "Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.". Novi Grad was a city in Sokovia, which was featured in the second "Avengers" movie.  Attilan, also known as the "hidden land" in the comics, which followed through in the show. The city was ruled over by Black Bolt and his family. In the series the city is located on Earth's moon.

questions.text: Which member of the Inhumans didn't know what she was until the opening scene of the series?
questions.explanation:
An unknown girl.

	The unknown girl's identity wasn't revealed in the pilot. She was being chased by several men with guns as the series opened. Triton showed up to rescue her, and told her that she was one of "us". At that moment she asked what that meant and was told that she was an Inhuman. The men continued to chase them, and ultimately shot Triton.

questions.text: Which main character didn't speak, other than in a flashback, in the entire pilot episode?
questions.explanation:
Black Bolt.

	Black Bolt is the king of the Inhumans. He has the top billing in the pilot episode, yet never speaks a word in the show. His powers are based on his voice, which can destroy just about anything if he were to speak, so he was forced to be portrayed as a non-speaking part in the pilot. The only word uttered by Black Bolt in the episode was in a flashback, he said "why" and it sent a shockwave out that killed his parents.

questions.text: What was the name of the crystals used to help reveal the Inhumans' powers?
questions.explanation:
Terrigen Crystals.

	The process was called Terrigenesis. Each member of the Inhumans would touch a sacred stone, and normally within a few minutes their powers would reveal themselves. In the pilot episode two new powers were revealed, a woman grows wings and the man gains the ability of foresight.

questions.text: Which member of the Inhumans keeps advocating a move to Earth?
questions.explanation:
Maximus.

	Maximus, the brother of king Black Bolt, was rendered powerless when he went through the Terrigenesis. His genetic makeup was nothing more than that of a normal human. He was saved from a life of servitude by his brother's position, but continued to push for a move to Earth so they could live among the humans.

questions.text: Medusa's hair was cut short during an attack.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Her long-flowing red locks were all cut short during the fight with Maximus' forces. While practically this meant saving money digitally creating her hair each week, within the confines of the show it reduced her powers and took away some of her status as she was whisked off to Earth after the attack.

questions.text: Gorgon, the head of the Royal Guards helped to overthrow the rest of the Inhumans.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Gorgon was sent to Earth to attempt to find Triton. While he was on Earth, Maximus convinced the rest of the Royal Guard to revolt against the other Inhuman royalty, resulting in many of them fleeing to Earth themselves.

questions.text: Who saved most of the Inhuman royal family by taking them to Earth?
questions.explanation:
Lockjaw.

	Crystal had Lockjaw transport the royal family one by one to Earth. Medusa had been shaved nearly bald and lost her powers, Black Bolt had no powers to transport anyone and Maximus was the one leading the revolt.
